page.title: 04Buildings
page.content: Buildings {Housing}There is a great diversity of buildings in and around Robertsbridge ranging from several large period residences to post war council houses. { Local History}Some of the buildings especially in Northbridge St.are evidence that Robertsbridge enjoyed a certain prosperity up to the 16th century.Later rebuilding,destruction and division of buildings indicate a decline in wealth. { Economics}The railway station with its direct line to London has attracted commuters to the area and encouraged modern house building and raised house prices. {Social Concerns}The A21 runs through the village and with it brings heavy traffic through the narrow road in the centre of the village.
